resources.string: Welcome, for help about app use see Menu>Help. For app just see options list and select one, fun.

string-array.name: options_description
string-array.item: Replace specifics chars or string in file name (this action replace all coincidences by a char).
Insert specifics chars in a specifics position, characters position starts in 0 to n.
Add auto-numeration to all file names (you must specific the start number and star position).
Extra features for the app, some features are marked as in develop.
